body.description: Originating in Korea & used by beauty aficionados around the globe, the Celavi sheet mask is an individually soaked paper sheet that contours to your face, locking in the treatment & ensuring maximum effectiveness. Treat yourself to a luxurious facial at the comforts of your own home. 12 Essence Set Includes - Aloe Vera, Cucumber, Collagen, Charcoal, Acai Berry, Seaweed, Tea Tree, Avocado, Vitamin C, Pomegranate, Ginseng, Honey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Korean Face Masks!
reviews.reviewText: These Korean Face Masks are great & easy to use! The mask is thin & made of cotton. It’s nice they are paraben & sulfate free. There is a scent of honey to each so if you’re fragrance sensitive I’d stay away. The 12 different varieties are wonderful to treat different needs of my skin. I found each to be beneficial. I make sure my skin is fully cleansed & while a little damp I apply the mask. It goes on smoothly & adheres. I let it sit for 15 minutes & it peels off super easy. I feel the dampness of my skin is the key after using a couple. My skin feels moisturized & refreshed! I’ve seen improvement in the tone & texture of my skin after using all 12. I’ll be purchasing again. 12 masks for $9.49 using subscribe & save is a great price with the quality & benefits each provide. I definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product overall great! Packaging and delivering on time. The product itself is good on my skin and have never had a problem. I have oily skin with some blacks pots and a bit of acne.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Variety! Great price
reviews.reviewText: These sheet masks are really nice. I use a sheet mask almost every day, in addition to my regular skin regiment. All of the masks I've used so far are nice. They leave my skin soft and supple. You can't beat the price. The average cost of a sheet mask at the drug store is $3-$4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It's very smooth, a very thin sheet but still works great. I did have to wash my face right after bit all in all it felt great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Important to know that you are getting your money Worth
reviews.reviewText: I really like this product the moisturizer in the masks fells so good on the face not to heavy, absorbs in the skin very well, I would order this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great for skincare. Lots of product, so the sheet mask is very wet. Popular with everyone for lots of different purposes, from sorority activities to getting ready for prom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super moisturizerizing, great value!
reviews.reviewText: A staple in my skin care! Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing masks & price
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is soo good everytime I use a mask no matter which 1 it always makes my face feel tight yet moisturized. So easy to use I keep them in the fridge, then just wash the face put a mask on depending on skin needs, leave for 15-30 mins, massage the rest of it on to skin & wake up with soft beautiful skin. Better then some of the expensive masks, over all just really worth it
